fullplot: The outcast red-haired teenager Rèmy is bulled at school and lives with his estranged mother and sister in France. The also red-haired psychiatrist Patrick befriends Rèmy and helps him to release his repressed hatred and sexuality. When Rèmy sees a picture of red-haired people in Ireland, he forces Patrick to travel with him to his dreamland.
